Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Anhur Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Enfeeble
Abilities.description: Dealing Damage to enemies reduces their Physical Protection. Stacks up to 2 times.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Shifting Sands
Abilities.description: Create a Pillar that Slows enemies around it and increases their damage taken from your basic attacks.
notes: The Slow stacks with an additional Slow when closer to the Pillar.
Reactivate to destroy the Pillar early.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Impale
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to enemies. Displace the first god hit and Stun them if they hit a wall.
notes: Enemies are Displaced in the direction the projectile is moving.
The Projectile passes through and damages minions, but stops on walls.
The enemy god displaced by this ability deals damage to enemies it collides with.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Disperse
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage and Displace enemies.
notes: Enemies are Displaces up and away from your landing location.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Desert Fury
Abilities.description: Channel to repeatedly fire projectiles that each deal Physical Damage. The final projectile deals a burst of Physical Damage.
notes: Ability fires 4 times, plus the final prohectile, over 1.5 seconds.
These projectiles pass through and damage all enemies, and pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Anubis Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - The Scales
Abilities.description: Gain bonus Lifesteal, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. These bonuses increase as your health declines.
notes: Gain 1 Stack of this buff for each 10% Health missing.
Bonuses cap at 18% bonus Lifesteal and 18 (Level 1) - 38 (Level 20) of each Protection at 80% lost HP.
Bonus Protections per Stack: 1.12 + 0.06 per Level

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Plague of Locusts
Abilities.description: Channel to deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you.
notes: This ability hits 12 times over 2.5 seconds.
You move at 35/30/25/20/15% Movement Speed while Channeling.
You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Mummify
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Stuns the first enemy god hit.
notes: Projectile ignores minions, and stops on walls.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Grasping Hands
Abilities.description: Repeatedly deal Magical Damage and Slow enemis in the area.
notes: This ability hits 4 times over 1.5 seconds.
Slow is refresfed on each hit, and does not stack.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Death Gaze
Abilities.description: Channel to deal a burst of Magical Damage to enemies in front of you, then repeatedly deal Magical Damage: to enemies in the same area. You are CC Immune: while Channeling.
notes: Ability hits 24 times, plus the initial burst, over 2.4 seconds.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Ares Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Blessed Armaments
Abilities.description: Provide Strength and Intelligence in an Aura. Build Protections to increase Strength Aura. Build Cooldown Rate to increase Intelligence Aura. Both Auras increase with Level.
notes: Provides more Strength as Ares builds protections. Provides more Intelligence as Ares builds Cooldown Reduction. Both increase with Level.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Shackles
Abilities.description: Fire a Shackle projectile that deals Physical Damage, Slows, and stops on first enemy god hit. Shackled gods take repeating Magical Damage and are Crippled. Successfully hitting an enemy god allows you to fire another projectile and increases your Movement Speed. Up to 3 projectiles can be fired in this way.
notes: This projectile passes through and damages non-God enemies, and passes through walls. It stops on Gods.
Movement Speed buff stacks for each uniquely shackled god.
You have 2 seconds to fire another Shackle after successfully hitting an enemy god.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Bolster Defenses
Abilities.description: You and allied gods around you gain increased Magical Protection, Physical Protection, and Basic Attack Damage. While this effect is active, each buffed god will be able to extend the duration and increase the effects of their buff by damaging enemy gods.
notes: The buff is extended by 4 seconds after hitting an enemy god 3 times.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Searing Flesh
Abilities.description: Channel to deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you. Deals damage based on the enemies' maximum Health in addition to base and scaling damage. You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.
notes: You can fire your Shackles ability while channeling this ability, but no other attacks.
You are Displacement immune while Channeling.
Damage Scaling Per Tick: 7% Intelligence + 1/1/2/2/3% Max Health
Minion Damage Scaling Per Tick: 7% Intelligence + 4% Max Health

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - No Escape
Abilities.description: Begin Channeling and immediately attach a Chain to gods around you, dealing Magical Damage. At the end the of channel, Displace Chained gods toward you, then deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies around you. You are CC Immune and gain Damage Mitigation while Channeling.
notes: Channel lasts 2.5 seconds. Enemy gods are Displaced toward you after 2.17 seconds of channeling.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Athena Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 2x damage and swing time.
The final hit of the chain hits all targets in the area for 2x damage.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Reach
Abilities.description: After each ability activation, your next basic attack becomes a projectile that deals Magical Damage.
notes: Deals 125% Strength + 70% Intelligence damage to the first target hit, passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls.
This basic attack can Critically Strike.
This basic attack can trigger Item Effects.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Preemptive Strike
Abilities.description: Dash forward to deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies adter a brief buildup. Gain Physical Protection and Magical Protection when you hit an enemy god.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Confound
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Taunt enemies in front of you.
notes: Taunt Duration: 0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2/1.35 seconds + 0.2s per 150 Protections from Items, stacking up to 2 times

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Shield Wall
Abilities.description: Create a Phalanx of Soldiers that deals Magical Damage to enemies. After a delay they deal Magical Damage to enemies before disappearing.
notes: The delay between the first and second attack is 2 seconds.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Defender of Olympus
Abilities.description: Channel and Shield an ally. When the channel completes, Teleport to their location. Deal Magical Damage to enemis upon landing.
notes: If your ally dies before your channel completes, you will still go to their location.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Bacchus Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Drunk - O - Meter
Abilities.description: Get Drunk from Chug to gain increased Strength, Intelligence, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. Also adds additional effects to your abilities.
notes: Drunkeness depletes over time at a rate of 2% per second.
Tipsy Buff: +3 Strength, +5 Intelligence, +5% Physical Protection, +5% Magical Protection.
Smashed Buff: +8 Strength, +10 Intelligence, +10% Physical Protection, +10% Magical Protection.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Chug
Abilities.description: Get Drunk, Heal, gain increased Strength and Intelligence, and your next basic attack deals additional Magical Damage.
notes: Empowered basic attack effect lasts until a target is succesfully hit.
Damage Scaling: 0/30/30/30/30/30% Physical and Magical Protection

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Belly Flop
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Magical Damage and Displace enemies.
notes: Damage Scaling: 75% Strength + 30% Physical Protection + 30% Magical Protection

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Belch of the Gods
Abilities.description: Channel to deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in front of you. The final hit will Stun if you are Tipsy or Smashed. Reduces enemy Healing. You are Displacement Immune while Channeling
notes: This ability hits 3 times, plus the final hit, over 1.5 seconds.
You Are Displacement Immune while Channeling.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Intoxicate
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Intoxicate enemies around you. Gain Strength and Intelligence if you are Smashed.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Bellona Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you. You have 4 different weapons to attack with, depending on the most recent ability used.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Bellon remains in her current basic attacks until she goes 7 seconds without dealing or taking damage.
Greatsword has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time, with no special effects.
Sword and Shield has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 0.5, 1 , 1x damage and swing time and provides 1 block stack ever enemy god hit. Max 3 stacks.
Hammer has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1.5, 1, 1.5x damage and 1.5, 1, 1.25x swing time. Hits all enemies in range of each attack.
Scourge has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1x damage and swing time, and heals you on every successful hit.
Scourge Heal Scaling Per Hit: 7% Physical Protection

Abilities.name: Passive  - Master of War
Abilities.description: Gain stacking Movement Speed when you hit or are hit by basic attacks. Gain additional effects depending on the basic attack weapon used.
notes: Sword and Shield gains Physical Protection and Magical Protection per stack.
Scourge gains Attack Speed per stack.
All basic attacks still gain the Movement Speed per stack.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Shield Bash
Abilities.description: Dash forward to deal Physical Damage and Slow enemies. Gain 1 Block Stack for each enemy god hit. Change to Sword and Shield basic attacks.
notes: Block absorbs all damage from one basic attack per stack.
Bellona's Blocks also reflect back a portion of the blocked damage to enemies around her. This effect scales off her Physical Protection and Magical Protection.
Reflect Damage: 25% of the damage blocked
Reflect Damage Scaling: 7% Physical and Magical Protection

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Bludgeon
Abilities.description: Spin to deal Physical Damage to enemies around you, then Slam to deal Physical Damage to enemies in an area. Change to Hammer basic attacks.
notes: Final Slam damage increases by 0.25 for each enemy god hit by the Spin attack.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Scourge
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage and Disarm enemies. Change to Scourge basic attacks.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Eagle's Rally
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies. You and allied Gods that remain in the area gain Strength, Intelligence, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. You are CC Immune: while Leaping.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Chaac Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Overflow
Abilities.description: After 5 succesful basic attacks, the next ability you activate has lower Cooldown, costs 0 Mana, and Heals you.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Thunder Strike
Abilities.description: Throw an Axe that deals Physical Damage to enemies in thew area. The Axe remains deployed to empower Torrent or Rain Dance.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Torrent
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies around you and gain Physical Protection and Magical Protection for each enemy hit.
notes: If you Dash, you will still do the area attack upon reaching the Axe.
Minions provide 1 stack, Gods provide 2 stacks.
Physical and Magical Protection: 5/7/9/11/13 Per Stack

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Rain Dance
Abilities.description: Create a Rain Storm that Heals you over time. While healing, the Rain Storm around you Slows and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies.
notes: If the Axe is deployed, create a Rain Storm at the Axe's location as well.
Enemies in both Rain Storms are Slowed and Debuffed for twice as much.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Storm Call
Abilities.description: Channel and gain Damage Mitigation while Channeling, then deal Physical Damage, Displace, and Silence enemies around you. You are CC Immune while Channeling.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Fenrir Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Unbound Runes
Abilities.description: Fenrir gains Runes on succesful basic attacks or from activating abilities. If he has 5 Runes, activating each ability will be granting additional effects.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Unchained
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage. At 5 Runes, Stun all enemies in the area, then all Runs are consumed. Gain 3 Runes on succesful hit if not at 5 Runes.
notes: Hitting an enemy god reduces the Cooldown of this ability by 30%.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Seething Howl
Abilities.description: Gain increased Strength, Attack Speed, and Lifesteal. At 5 Runes, allied Gods around you also gain increased Lifesteal. Does not consume Runes. Gain 3 Runes if not at 5 Runes.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Brutalize
Abilities.description: Leap forward, Channel and grab onto an enemy, and deal Physical Damage repeatedly to all enemies in the area. At 5 Runes, the Strength scaling is increased, then all Runes are consumed. Gain 1 Rune per succesful hit if not at 5 Runes.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Ragnarok
Abilities.description: Activate to become immense, gain increased Movement Speed, Physical Protection, and Magical Protection. Your next basic attack grabs and enemy God, allowing you to Displace and carry them to any position. Gain 5 Runes. You are CC Immune for the duration.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Hades Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Applies Blight.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Blight
Abilities.description: Your attacks and abilities apply Blight. Blighted enemies have reduced Strength and Intelligence, and receive additional effects from your abilities.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Death From Below
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Magical Damage to enemies. Slows Blighted enemies. Applies Blight.
notes: Enemies take reduced damage if hit by multiple explosions.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Shroud of Darkness
Abilities.description: Silence enemies in front of you. Fear Blighted enemies. Applies Blight.
notes: Enemies are feared in a random direction away from Hades.
Silence Duration Scaling: 0.2s per 150 Protections from Items, stacking up to 2 times
Feared Duration Scaling: 0.2s per 150 Protections from Items, stacking up to 2 times

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Devour Souls
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to enemies around you. Blighted enemies explode when hit, dealing additional Magical Damage to them and enemies around them. Heal yourself and your allies around you per Blighted enemy hit.
notes: Heal Scaling: 10% of Protections from Items

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Pillar of Agony
Abilities.description: Channel to repeatedly deal Magical Damage and repeatedly Vortex enemies around you, reducing your abilities cooldowns for each hit. While channeling, you may use another ability, but only once. Reduce the Physical and Magical Protections of Blighted enemies damaged. You are CC Immune while Channeling and gain increased Physical Protection and Magical Protection.
notes: Vortexes slow targets moving away from the source, or speed up targets moving toward it.
This Vortex increases in intensity as the channel time progresses.
Channel times is 4 seconds. Hits 8 times.
Physical Protection: 50/65/80/95/110 + 10% Physical Protections from Items
Magical Protection: 50/65/80/95/110 + 10% Magical Protections from Items

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Jing Wei Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Rapid Reincarnation
Abilities.description: When exiting the fountain, fly into the sky and soar over obstacles. Select a landing location early or descend when the duration expires.
notes: This abilty can be canceled before ascending.
Jing Wei will not ascend if firing basic attacks when leaving the fountain.
Jing Wei is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Persistent Gust
Abilities.description: Create a Gust of Wind that deals Physical Damage and Knocks Up enemy gods and yourself. The Gust area continually deals Physical Damage. You gain increased Attack Speed while in the outer area of the Gust.
notes: The Attack Speed buff is constantly refreshed while in the outer area.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Explosive Bolts
Abilities.description: Your next 3 basic attacks are wider, have increased damage scaling, and explode on the first enemy hit. You gain increased Critical Strike Chance while this ability is active. This ability can gain multiple charges.
notes: This ability goes on cooldown immediately on use.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Agility
Abilities.description: Dash forward and gain increased Strength. This ability can be used while Displaced and you will Dash further.
notes: Dash range is longer when used while Displaced.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Air Strike
Abilities.description: Dash forward and fly into the sky, dropping explosives and dealing Physical Damage to enemies beneath you. Select a landing location, or wait to Dash backwards, dealing Physical Damage to enemies again before selecting a landing location.
notes: Jing Wei is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Kukulkan Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Power of the Wind Jewel
Abilities.description: Gain increased Intelligence from the items that provide Maximum Mana.
notes: This effect does not scale off Base God Mana.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Zephyr
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that explodes on the first enemy hit. The explosion deals Magical Damage and Slows enemies in the area.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Slipstream
Abilities.description: Become Slow Immune and gain 4 Stacks of Movement Speed that gradually falls off over the duration of the effect. Activate this ability while within the area of Whirlwind to Dash instead, dealing Magical Damage and Slowing enemies hit.
notes: Movement Speed Buff is applied as 4 stacks. Stacks are lost one at a time.
Dash passes through and hits all enemy types.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Whirlwind
Abilities.description: Create a Whirlwind that repeatedly applies a Magical Damage over Time to enemies in the area.
notes: The Whirlwind attempts to apply the effect every 0.35 seconds for 4 seconds.
Damage over Time and Slow are refreshed on each hit.
Damage over Time hits 6 times over 2.5 seconds.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Spirit of the Nine Winds
Abilities.description: Fire a delayed projectile that deals Magical Damage and Displaces enemies hit.
notes: Projectile passes through and damages all enemy targets, and passes through walls.
Enemies are Displaced up and away from the projectile.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Loki Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 5 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.5x damage and swing time.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Behind You
Abilities.description: Hitting enemies from behind deals increased damage to them.
notes: The increased damage from this effect also triggers on enemies Blinded by Agonizing Visions.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Vanish
Abilities.description: Activate to enter Stealth and gain Movement Speed. Your next basic attack deals additional Physical Damage over time. Killing a god immediately refreshes the cooldown of this ability.
notes: Stealthed Gods are invisible to enemies unless they enter an enemy structure's attack area.
Taking damage while Stealth partially reveals you for 0.33 seconds.
You are Immune to Slows while Stealthed.
Stealth is broken when hit by Hard CC.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Agonizing Visions
Abilities.description: Create a Vision of Loki that repeatedly deals Physical Damage to enemies around it and reduces their damage dealt. Enemies hit 4 times are Blinded.
notes: Blinded players have their game camera obscured.
The Vision Impedes enemy characters only.
Loki benefits from Behind You on Blinded enemies from all directions.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Flurry Strike
Abilities.description: Channel to deal Physical Damage and Slow enemies in front of you. The final hit deals increased Physical Damage and applies a stronger Slow. You are Displacement Immune while Channeling.
notes: Slow is refreshed with each hit but does not stack.
This ability can benefit from Behind You.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Assassinate
Abilities.description: Teleport to the target location, deal Physical Damage to and Cripple enemies in the area. Then deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you.
notes: Loki locks onto the enemy god closest to the center of the teleport location, if there is one.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Neith Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Broken Weave
Abilities.description: Your abilities can create Weaves or detonate them to deal additional Physical Damage and Root enemis in a larger area. Detonate Weaves to gain a stacking Attack Speed and Intelligence increase per Weave detonated.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Spirit Arrow
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Roots enemies. Hitting a Weave detonates it.
notes: Projectile passes through and damages all enemies, and passes through walls.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Unravel
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in the area. Heal yourself on successful hit or Heal a larger amount when hitting a God. Creates Weaves in the area.
notes: Always creates a Weave in the center of the area. Creates additional Weaves for each enemy God hit at the locations of those Gods.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Back Flip
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you, then Leap backwards. Hitting a Weave with the initial damage detonates it.
notes: This ability can Leap over walls, as long as you can reach a valid landing area.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - World Weaver
Abilities.description: Channel to begin charging an attack and lock on to an enemy God. Reactivate to fire a homing projectile at the selected God that deals Physical Damage and Stuns.
notes: Damage scales linearly from 50% to 100% based on Channel time.
Channel for 0.5 seconds for minimum damage, or for 2 seconds to deal fully charged damage.
Projectile ignores minions, passes through walls.
Enemy Gods can step in front of this projectile to be hit by it instead of the selected god.
You can cancel this ability anytime before firing, the costs and cooldown will not be consumed.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Odin Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 4 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1, 1.5x damage and swing time.
The final hit of the chain hits all targets in the area for 2x damage.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Path to Valhalla
Abilities.description: Gain stacking increased Movement Speed, Strength and Intelligence whenever a god dies.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Lunge
Abilities.description: Leap forward to deal Physical Damage to enemies.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Raven Shout
Abilities.description: Gain Health Shield for a duration. At the end of the duration or when landing from a Lunge, the shield explodes dealing Physical Damage equal to the Shield Health to enemies around you. Deals increased Physical Damage if the Shield is at full HP when it explodes.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Gungnir's Might
Abilities.description: Channel to deal Physical Damage and Slow enemies around you through two pulses. Reactivate to fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage to enemies. If reactivated before the final pulse, grant Attack Speed to nearby allies and the ability will have a 40% reduced cooldown. If reactivated after the final pulse, the projectile Stuns.
notes: Projectile passes through and damages all targets, stops on the first God hit, and stops on walls.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Ring of Spears
Abilities.description: Create a Ring of Spears that Impedes enemy movement, prevents them from healing, and decreases their Strength and Intelligence. Enemies who exit the area take Physical Damage and are Slowed, unless they exit through a Segment of the Ring that has been broken by basic attacks.
notes: Ring of Spears does not block ally movement or projectiles, only enemy basic attacks and enemy God movement.
The Ring is made of 8 Segments that each have 5 Hit Points. An enemy basic attack will deal 1 Hit Point per hit.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Sol Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Generates Heat.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Unstable Manifestation
Abilities.description: Gain Heat from hitting enemies with basic attacks or from using abilities to gain increased Strength, Intelligence, and Attack Speed. At Max Heat, increase your basic attack damage.
notes: Heat starts depleting if you have not generated Heat within the last 6 seconds.
Heat depleats over time at a rate of 6 Heat per 0.33 seconds.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Radiance
Abilities.description: Create a Pool of Flames at your location. Heal yourself over time, and instantly generate Heat. The pool repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. The more Heat you have at the time the pool is created, the larger its area will be.
notes: Pool scales from 1x radius at 0 Heat to 2x radius at 100 Heat.
This ability hits 3 times over 3 seconds.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Stellar Burst
Abilities.description: Your next basic attack fires a projectile that explodes, then retracts, and generates Heat. Both the explosion and the retraction deal Magical Damage to enemies and Slows them.
notes: Projectile stops and explodes on first enemy hit, walls, or max range.
Can only trigger ability based items and effects.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Disapparate
Abilities.description: Gain Movement Speed, and Slow Immunity, begin creating a Trail of Flames behind you, and instantly generate Heat. The Trail persists and repeatedly deals Magical Damage to enemies in the area. After 3 seconds, detonate the Trail dealing Magical Damage, become Immune and unable to attack.
notes: You can cancel out of the Immune state early.
This Immune state is Damage Immunity, Healing Immunity, CC Immunity, Untargettable, and makes you able to pass through allies, enemies, and Impediments.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Supernova
Abilities.description: Channel to generate Heat, select 8 areas, then repeatedly deal Magical Damage to enemies in those areas. The first time an enemy is hit, they are Displaced. All subsequent hits deal decreased damage. You are CC Immune while Channeling.
notes: Areas are selected every 0.18 seconds or when your targeter has moved more than 1.8 meters since the last area was selected.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Susano Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center od the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in order of 1, 1, 1.25x damage and swing time.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Storm's Edge
Abilities.description: When you use an ability your next basic attack will debuff the enemy hit. Weave in basic attack hits between abilities to progressively stack the debuff.
notes: Enemies with 1-2 stacks have 10% reduced Strength.
Enemies with 3-4 stacks are Slowed by 15% and maintain previous Debuff.
Enemies with 5-6 stacks tale 10% increased damage and maintain previous Debuffs.
Debuffs last 3s and refresh on a new application.
Each attack of Storm Kata can trigger ability item effects.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Storm Kata
Abilities.description: Strike and deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. This ability can be used a second time to Spin and Deal Physical Damage to enemies around you. This ability can be used a third time to Dash forward and deal Physical Damage to all enemies hit.
notes: This ability Cooldown is increased by 1s for each additional attack used.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Wind Siphon
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. Enemies in the inner area are also Pulled towards you.
notes: Enemies are Pulled to the location in front of you at the start of the attack.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Jet Stream
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that stops on walls or the first enemy hit creating a Whirlwind which repeatedly deals Physical Damage. This ability can be used again to Teleport to the Whirlwind.
notes: The Whirlwind will travel with the enemy hit.
This ability Cooldown is reduced by 4s when Teleporting to an enemy.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Typhoon
Abilities.description: Create a Typhoon which repeatedly deals Physical Damage. This ability can be used again to fire the Typhoon, dealing Physical Damage and Displacing enemies hit.
notes: This ability starts at 50% Size and Damage and increases over the duration.
The Typhoon will travel in the duration Susano is facing on refire.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Thanatos Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.
Has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in an order of 1 / 0.75 / 1.5x damage and swing time.
The final swing hits all targets in range.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Harvester of Souls
Abilities.description: Enemy Gods at low health are revealed to you and can be Executed by Hovering Death. Killing an enemy heals Thanatos and reduced all of his cooldowns. Thanatos' abilities cost health.
notes: The health threshold is determined by the rank of Hovering Death, using the first rank value when Hovering Death is unranked.
God Kill Heal: 15% of their Max Health
NPC Kill Heal: 7% of their Max Health

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Death Scythe
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Physical Damage and Slows the first target hit.
notes: Gods hit by the projectile take 10% of their Max Health as bonus Physical Damage.
Thanatos Heals for 50% of the total damage done.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Scent of Death
Abilities.description: Gain Movement Speed and Flat Penetration. Deal Bonus Damage and run faster towards enemies in Execute Range.
notes: Bonus Movement Speed scales from 0% effectiveness to 100% effectiveness. 0% when the targets health is at Execute Threshold and 100% when the target is 1 health.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Soul Reap
Abilities.description: Sweep in front of you to deal Physical Damage and Silence enemies hit.
notes: Thanatos sweeps in front of him, inheriting any additional rotation during the fire.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Hovering Death
Abilities.description: Fly into the sky and select a landing location. Deal Physical Damage and Stun enemies hit. Execute enemies at low health.
notes: Thanatos gains 125% Movement Speed while flying.
Execute kills enemies even if their death would normally be prevented by other god abilities.
If Thanatos is aiming at an invalid location when the ult expires, he will land on the last valid aimed location.
Thanatos is fully CC Immune during buildup, ascent, flight, and descent.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - The Morrigan Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Throw a projectile forward that deals Magical Damage to enemies hit.
notes: The Morrigan has a 3 hit chain. Attacks in an order of 1 / 1 / 1x damage and fire time. The final fire explodes on target, applying Doomsayer.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Doomsayer
Abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 3 hit chain. The final Basic Attack explodes, dealing 9% of the targets Health over 3s.
notes: This Damage Over Time can Crit.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Deadly Aspects
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you after a brief buildup.
notes: The buildup for this ability does not break Confusion's Stealth.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Dark Omen
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage. Enemy gods hit are marked. The mark triggers for Magical Damage when that god is damaged by any god ability.
notes: Projectile deals bonus damage equal to the Mark trigger when hitting Minions or Jungle Monsters.
The Morrigan deals the mark trigger damage, even if another god triggers it. She can receive kills this way.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Confusion
Abilities.description: Stealth immediately and gain Movement Speed. Send a clone of yourself to a target location.
notes: When the clone is damaged, it will appear as an illusion. It will change appearance and lose its health bar.
The clone grants vision around itself.
Taking damage while stealthed breaks the effect.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Changeling
Abilities.description: Select a target to transform into. Gain access to their abilities and items for 10 seconds.
notes: If the god you transform into has an Ultimate Cooldown longer than this Ultimate's Cooldown, use the transformed targets Cooldown instead.
You will copy all their abilities and items, all with no cooldown.
You will copy their ability ranks. If your level is different to the transform target's it will use the order they ranked their abilities, filling with Auto Skill as needed.
If you are in the middle of firing an ability when the transform times out, you will detransform the moment that ability fire ends.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Ymir Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage to an enemy in front of you.
notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Frostbite
Abilities.description: Your abilities apply Frostbite, causing enemies to take more basic attack damage from you and to deal less damage to you.
notes: Frostbite's effect stacks with Critical Strikes.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Ice Wall
Abilities.description: Create a Wall that Displaces enemies on creation. Applies Frostbite to Displaced enemies.
notes: Create a Wall at your feet to Displace yourself up and forward.
Displaces enemies up and away from the Wall.
Reactivate to destroy the Wall early.

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Glacial Strike
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Slow enemies. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit.
notes: Damaging area starts at Ymir and moves away over time.
You are Slowed by 42.5% during activation.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Frost Breath
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and Stun enemies in front of you. Applies Frostbite on succesful hit.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Shards of Ice
Abilities.description: Channel to Slow enemies around you. Deal a burst of Magical Damage when the Channel is complete. Applies Frostbite immediately to enemies in the area. You are CC Immune while Channeling.
notes: Damage scales linearly from 35% + 0.03% Intelligence to 100% based on Channel time.

Abilities.name: Basic Attack  - Zeus Basic Attack
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that deals Magical Damage to the first enemy hit. Applies Charges.
notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

Abilities.name: Passive  - Overcharge
Abilities.description: Deal damage to apply Charges. Enemies take increased basic attack damage from you for each Charge they have.

Abilities.name: 1st Ability  - Chain Lightning
Abilities.description: Fire a projectile that hits and enemy and then chains to nearby enemies. Any enemies hit are dealt Magical Damage, Slowed, and receive a Charge

Abilities.name: 2nd Ability  - Thunderclap
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage and apply a Charge to enemies around you, then gain increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and reduced basic attack Movement Penalty.

Abilities.name: 3rd Ability  - Detonate Charge
Abilities.description: Activate to deal Magical Damage to enemies for each Charge, and Stun enemies that had max Charges.
notes: This ability cannot be activated unless an enemy has a Charge.
Damage is multiplied by 1/1.7/2.4 based on the number of Charges.

Abilities.name: Ultimate  - Lightning Storm
Abilities.description: Deal Magical Damage repeatedly to enemies in the area, applying a Charge on each hit.
